results.title: The protective effect of metformin against testicular damage in diabetes and prostate cancer model.
results.text_hl: Individuals with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ have an increased risk of @DISEASE_Colorectal_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D015179 @@@breast, colorectal, pancreatic and prostate cancer@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, an oral @CHEMICAL_Biguanides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001645 @@@biguanide@@@ used to treat @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@, has anti-hyperglycaemic, anti-@<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Hyperinsulinism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D044903 @@@hyperinsulinemic@@@ and antioxidant activities.

citations.NLM: Koroglu Aydın P, Karabulut-Bulan O, Bugan I, Turkyilmaz IB, Altun S, Yanardag R. The protective effect of metformin against testicular damage in diabetes and prostate cancer model. Cell Biochem Funct. 2022 Jan;40(1):60-70. PMID: 34845738

results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Hyperinsulinism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D044903 @@@Hyperinsulinemic@@@ subjects were treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (500 mg po tid) and @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ profiles were reevaluated at 3 and 6 months of treatment.

results.title: Metformin and polycystic ovary syndrome.
results.text_hl: The use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Hyperinsulinism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D044903 @@@hyperinsulinemic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ improved the @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ profile, including decreases in total @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@, low density lipoprotein cholesterol, and @CHEMICAL_Triglycerides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014280 @@@triglyceride@@@ concentration.
